ssot__FlowVersion__dlm.name: Flow Version
ssot__FlowVersion__dlm.description: The Flow Version DMO represents the details about a version of a flow.

ssot__FlowId__c.description: A reference ID to the parent flow of the flow version.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as a primary key for the Flow Version DMO.

ssot__VersionNumber__c.description: The version number of the flow version.
